requirement_tested: Implement a search functionality allowing users to input stock codes or names
user_persona: A new investor exploring stock information for the first time.
user_goal: To find information about a specific stock by entering its name or code.

narrative_steps.title: Landing on Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Alex opens the website and sees a centered search bar at the top of the page. He wants to look up Apple Inc.
narrative_steps.action: Click inside the search bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The search bar becomes focused and ready for input with a blinking cursor.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Stock Name
narrative_steps.description: Alex types 'Apple' into the search bar, noticing the navy border around the field.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'Apple' into the search input field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Text appears in the input box as typed.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Search
narrative_steps.description: After typing, Alex presses Enter to initiate the search for Apple-related stocks.
narrative_steps.action: Press the Enter key.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Search results or suggestions appear below the search bar.

requirement_tested: Provide auto-suggest or autocomplete feature for stock search input
user_persona: A frequent trader who knows stock symbols but wants quick confirmation.
user_goal: To quickly confirm and select the correct stock using real-time suggestions.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Typing
narrative_steps.description: Jordan starts typing 'TSLA' into the search bar hoping to get Tesla's data.
narrative_steps.action: Begin typing 'TSLA' into the search input.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A dropdown list with matching stock suggestions appears instantly.

narrative_steps.title: Browsing Suggestions
narrative_steps.description: Jordan notices several suggestions pop up, including 'TSLA - Tesla, Inc.', and hovers over it.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over the suggestion 'TSLA - Tesla, Inc.'
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The hovered item changes background to light gray (#f0f0f0).

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Suggestion
narrative_steps.description: Satisfied with the match, Jordan clicks on the suggestion to proceed.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the suggestion 'TSLA - Tesla, Inc.'
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The search bar gets populated with 'TSLA' and triggers the search automatically.

requirement_tested: Create a stock information summary display showing basic stock details
user_persona: An analyst reviewing multiple companies’ core metrics.
user_goal: To quickly review key stock details like price, volume, and market cap.

narrative_steps.title: Searching for Stock
narrative_steps.description: Morgan searches for 'MSFT' to analyze Microsoft's performance.
narrative_steps.action: Enter 'MSFT' into the search bar and press Enter.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system returns Microsoft's summary card with basic stock information displayed below the search bar.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Summary Card
narrative_steps.description: Morgan looks at the card which shows current price, daily change, open/close prices, and other vital stats.
narrative_steps.action: Visually scan the summary card content.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All essential stock metrics are clearly visible with navy text against the background image.

requirement_tested: Include market trends visualization section in stock reports
user_persona: A portfolio manager evaluating long-term trends before making investment decisions.
user_goal: To visualize how a stock has performed historically over different time ranges.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Market Trends Section
narrative_steps.description: Riley selects Amazon (AMZN) and scrolls down to the Market Trends section.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll down to the chart area after searching for AMZN.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A line graph appears showing Amazon's price movements over time.

narrative_steps.title: Changing Time Range
narrative_steps.description: Riley wants to compare yearly performance with monthly trends, so he clicks the '1Y' button.
narrative_steps.action: Click the '1Y' time range button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The chart updates dynamically to show Amazon's performance over the past year.

requirement_tested: Integrate financial data display including key financial metrics and ratios
user_persona: A finance student studying company fundamentals.
user_goal: To understand key financial health indicators of a company.

narrative_steps.title: Locating Financial Data Table
narrative_steps.description: Casey searches for Google (GOOGL) and finds the Financial Data tabular view.
narrative_steps.action: Search for GOOGL and scroll to the financial data section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A neatly formatted table with headers like P/E Ratio, EPS, Dividend Yield, etc., is shown with navy headers.

narrative_steps.title: Analyzing Metrics
narrative_steps.description: Casey reviews values like ROE and Debt-to-Equity Ratio to assess Google’s financial stability.
narrative_steps.action: Read through the rows of financial metrics.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each metric is presented clearly with alternating row colors for readability.

requirement_tested: Offer customizable report format selection options
user_persona: A researcher preparing materials for publication.
user_goal: To generate a stock report in a specific format suitable for sharing.

narrative_steps.title: Choosing Report Format
narrative_steps.description: Jamie wants to export a report on Netflix (NFLX) in Markdown format for easy documentation.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the format selector and click on the Markdown option.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The Markdown option becomes selected, updating the preview accordingly.

narrative_steps.title: Confirming Selection
narrative_steps.description: Jamie confirms that the selected format reflects correctly before proceeding.
narrative_steps.action: Verify the selected format visually.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Markdown is visibly marked as the active choice among PDF, HTML, and Markdown.

requirement_tested: Provide content selection controls for users to choose report sections
user_persona: A busy executive needing only critical insights from stock reports.
user_goal: To customize the report to include only relevant sections for faster reading.

narrative_steps.title: Customizing Sections
narrative_steps.description: Patricia decides she only needs Basic Info and Financial Data from Ford Motor Co. (F).
narrative_steps.action: Click the checkboxes for 'Basic Info' and 'Financial Data'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both checkboxes become checked, indicating those sections will be included.

narrative_steps.title: Excluding Unneeded Sections
narrative_steps.description: She leaves Analyst Opinions and News Summary unchecked to keep the report concise.
narrative_steps.action: Leave 'Analyst Opinions' and 'News Summary' unchecked.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: These sections remain unselected and won’t appear in the final report.

requirement_tested: Generate automated stock reports based on user-selected criteria
user_persona: A consultant compiling weekly summaries for clients.
user_goal: To produce a fully customized stock report efficiently.

narrative_steps.title: Configuring Report Parameters
narrative_steps.description: Sam sets up his report for Coca-Cola (KO) choosing PDF format and checking all sections except News Summary.
narrative_steps.action: Set format to PDF and check desired sections.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Format and sections reflect Sam's choices accurately.

narrative_steps.title: Generating Report
narrative_steps.description: Sam clicks the Generate Report button to compile everything together.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Generate Report' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A loading spinner replaces the button temporarily while the report generates.

narrative_steps.title: Receiving Generated Report
narrative_steps.description: After a few moments, the completed report appears on-screen.
narrative_steps.action: Wait for report generation to complete.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The full custom report is rendered or made available for download.

requirement_tested: Implement white background color scheme across the entire website
user_persona: A designer checking consistency of visual design elements.
user_goal: To ensure uniformity in background coloring throughout the site.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Homepage Background
narrative_steps.description: Taylor visits the homepage and checks whether the overall background is consistently white.
narrative_steps.action: Load the homepage and observe the main container background.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Main background remains solid white (#FFFFFF) across all containers and panels.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Inner Pages
narrative_steps.description: Taylor navigates to the report generation page to verify consistent white backgrounds there too.
narrative_steps.action: Visit internal pages like the report generator interface.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All inner pages maintain the same white background theme.

requirement_tested: Apply navy color theme to all UI components and interactive elements
user_persona: A UX tester validating branding consistency.
user_goal: To confirm that interactive elements use the specified navy color theme.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Buttons
narrative_steps.description: Quinn inspects the 'Generate Report' button to ensure it uses the navy theme.
narrative_steps.action: Look at buttons and form controls on the report setup page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Buttons have navy borders and text, adhering to the defined navyThemeColors.primary.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Hover Effects
narrative_steps.description: Quinn hovers over the 'Login' link in the header to see the hover effect.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over interactive elements like buttons and links.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Elements slightly darken using navyThemeColors.secondary on hover.

requirement_tested: Ensure responsive layout that works across different device sizes
user_persona: A mobile-first user accessing the platform primarily on a smartphone.
user_goal: To navigate and interact seamlessly regardless of screen size.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Site on Mobile
narrative_steps.description: Devon accesses the site on a mobile phone and checks how the layout adapts.
narrative_steps.action: Open the site on a smartphone browser.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Content stacks vertically, padding adjusts, and touch targets are appropriately sized.

narrative_steps.title: Resizing Window on Desktop
narrative_steps.description: On desktop, Devon resizes the window to simulate smaller devices.
narrative_steps.action: Resize browser window to mimic tablet and mobile dimensions.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout shifts responsively using CSS Grid/Flexbox adjustments based on breakpoints.

requirement_tested: Include loading states or progress indicators during report generation
user_persona: An impatient user expecting immediate feedback during wait times.
user_goal: To know that the system is actively working when generating reports.

narrative_steps.title: Triggering Long Process
narrative_steps.description: Blake submits a complex report request involving many sections and waits.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Generate Report' with multiple sections selected.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A centrally-aligned loading spinner appears immediately, replacing the button.

narrative_steps.title: Monitoring Progress
narrative_steps.description: Blake watches the spinner animate while waiting for the report.
narrative_steps.action: Observe the loading indicator animation.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Spinner continues animating until the report finishes processing.

requirement_tested: Provide error handling for invalid stock codes or unavailable data
user_persona: A cautious user double-checking accuracy of inputs.
user_goal: To receive helpful guidance when entering incorrect stock identifiers.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Invalid Symbol
narrative_steps.description: Kai mistakenly enters 'XYZ123' into the search bar and hits Enter.
narrative_steps.action: Input 'XYZ123' and press Enter.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: An error message appears beneath the search bar stating 'Invalid stock symbol entered. Please try again.'

narrative_steps.title: Noticing Visual Feedback
narrative_steps.description: Kai notices the red-colored error text and warning icon indicating something went wrong.
narrative_steps.action: Scan the error notification area.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Error message follows the errorDisplayStyle with red text and an exclamation icon.

requirement_tested: Implement report export or download functionality
user_persona: A professional needing offline access to generated reports.
user_goal: To download a generated report in a preferred file format.

narrative_steps.title: Preparing Download
narrative_steps.description: Zoe completes her report on IBM and now wants to save it locally as a PDF.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Download' button next to the generated report.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A dropdown menu shows supported formats like PDF, CSV, DOCX.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Export Format
narrative_steps.description: Zoe chooses PDF from the options and proceeds with the download.
narrative_steps.action: Select 'PDF' from the dropdown and click the download option.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A file download prompt appears allowing Zoe to save the PDF version of the report.

requirement_tested: Add user authentication or session management for personalized experiences
user_persona: A returning user wanting to preserve personal settings.
user_goal: To access previously saved preferences and manage account securely.

narrative_steps.title: Logging In
narrative_steps.description: Nia clicks the 'Login' link in the top-right corner to access her profile.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Login' link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the login page (/login) where Nia can enter credentials.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Profile Features
narrative_steps.description: After logging in, Nia sees her avatar and accesses saved watchlists.
narrative_steps.action: Log in successfully and return to the homepage.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Avatar replaces the 'Login' link, and session-based features like saved reports are accessible.
